title: Locanda del Giglio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, European, Swiss, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Eco-hotel dining facility offering a separate paper with a veg dishes which includes appetizers, first courses, second courses, dessert, organic wines. Intimate and familiar environment, terrace with an open view. Buffet evenings are vegan-friendly.
